name: Tiny Tales
description:
Update 2020: We have left app for FREE, enjoy it! :)

This application enables integrated shopping. Integrated shopping can be disabled in the settings of your mobile device or tablet.

Classic Bedtime Stories or practice languages??:

The Pied Piper of Hamelin
The Steadfast Tin Soldier
The Princess and the Pea
The Magic Mill
Goldilocks
The Little Mermaid
The Ugly Duckling

With a unique design 4Stones Game Studio, we offer the possibility of children get used to the English and Spanish languages ??from an early age and in a fun way and educational.

Download this app to your smartphone or tablet and enjoy our stories. With your support we as developers evolve and provide more and better games.

To any incident, we appreciate the report, go to our contact address: 4stonesgamestudio@gmail.com, try to solve.

Follow us on...
